mapper.select: select distinct event_node pk_value,event_node_desc pk_desc from mb_event_nodes where PROD_TYPE = #{prodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EVENT_TYPE = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into mb_event_nodes
PROD_TYPE,
EVENT_TYPE,
EVENT_NODE,
EVENT_NODE_DESC,
ALIAS,
CLAZZ,
METHOD_NAME,
METHOD_TYPE,
ARGS,
ARG_CLAZZ,
VAR,
